00032 #include "nsISupports.idl"
00033 
00034 interface nsISimpleEnumerator;
00035 interface sbIMediaListView;
00036 
00037 /*
00038 Class: MediaList
00039 A <MediaList> is a list of <MediaItems>. A <MediaList> is also itself a <MediaItem> 
00040 and can be used as a parameter to functions that take a <MediaItem>.
00041 */
00042 
00050 [scriptable, uuid(30644bad-4d6b-4e01-ab62-17ee4d775413)]
00051 interface sbIRemoteMediaList : nsISupports
00052 {
00053   [noscript] sbIMediaListView getView();
00054 };
